body:
We use `public RegistryKey? OpenSubKey(string name, bool writable)` overload where writable permissions is defined as https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/blob/57bfe474518ab5b7cfe6bf7424a79ce3af9d6657/src/libraries/Common/src/Interop/Windows/Advapi32/Interop.RegistryConstants.cs#L37 Exception place https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/ee6bc9527c2596f048088fa7b396d2664a11ad08/src/System.Management.Automation/namespaces/RegistryProvider.cs#L3441 https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/ee6bc9527c2596f048088fa7b396d2664a11ad08/src/System.Management.Automation/namespaces/RegistryWrapper.cs#L180 ```powershell Get-Error Exception : Type : System.Security.SecurityException TargetSite : Name : InternalOpenSubKeyCore DeclaringType : Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey MemberType : Method Module : Microsoft.Win32.Registry.dll Message : Requested registry access is not allowed. Source : Microsoft.Win32.Registry HResult : -2146233078 StackTrace : at Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey.InternalOpenSubKeyCore(String name, Boolean writable) at Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.RegistryWrapper.OpenSubKey(String name, Boolean writable) in C:\Users\1\Documents\G itHub\iSazonov\PowerShell\src\System.Management.Automation\namespaces\RegistryWrapper.cs:line 180 at Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.RegistryProvider.GetRegkeyForPath(String path, Boolean writeAccess) in C:\Users\1\D ocuments\GitHub\iSazonov\PowerShell\src\System.Management.Automation\namespaces\RegistryProvider.cs:line 3555 at Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.RegistryProvider.GetRegkeyForPathWriteIfError(String path, Boolean writeAccess) in C:\Users\1\Documents\GitHub\iSazonov\PowerShell\src\System.Management.Automation\namespaces\RegistryProvider.cs:line 34 41 TargetObject : HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\DenySetValue CategoryInfo : PermissionDenied: (HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\DenySetValue:String) [New-Item], Securi tyException FullyQualifiedErrorId : System.Security.SecurityException,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.NewItemCommand InvocationInfo : MyCommand : New-Item ScriptLineNumber : 1 OffsetInLine : 1 HistoryId : 2 Line : New-Item HKLM:\SOFTWARE\DenySetValue\TestPS PositionMessage : At line:1 char:1 + New-Item HKLM:\SOFTWARE\DenySetValue\TestPS + ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ InvocationName : New-Item CommandOrigin : Internal ScriptStackTrace : at , : line 1 PipelineIterationInfo : ```
